results.title: Red Energy
results.description: You are full of passion and energy! Red symbolizes vitality and strong will. You're not afraid of challenges and express yourself actively. You have strong leadership and are goal-oriented.
results.advice: Sometimes step back and look around. Having lots of energy is good, but consider others' pace too. Rest is also necessary.

results.title: Blue Energy
results.description: You are calm and intellectual! Blue symbolizes trust and tranquility. You love to think deeply and analyze, valuing stable relationships. You have great intuition and creativity.
results.advice: Pay attention to expressing emotions too. Thinking a lot is good, but sometimes trust your intuition and act. Be open to new experiences.

results.title: Green Energy
results.description: You are peaceful and seek harmony! Green symbolizes nature and balance. You value stability and try to live harmoniously with those around you. You have healing energy.
results.advice: Express your opinions more actively. Focusing too much on harmony might make you lose yourself. Sometimes change is needed.

results.title: Yellow Energy
results.description: You are bright and optimistic! Yellow symbolizes joy and hope. You brighten your surroundings with positive energy, are social and have great sense of humor. You're very curious.
results.advice: Deep relationships are important too. Showing only your bright side might hide your true feelings. Sometimes have serious conversations.

results.title: Purple Energy
results.description: You have a mysterious and unique charm! Purple symbolizes creativity and spirituality. You have great artistic sense and strong intuition. You're independent yet have deep sensitivity.
results.advice: Take care of practical matters too. Getting lost in ideals might make you miss reality. Don't forget to communicate with those around you.

results.title: Pink Energy
results.description: You are lovely and warm! Pink symbolizes love and care. You're romantic and emotional, loving to take care of others. You have a gentle charisma.
results.advice: Take care of yourself too. Caring for others is great, but your emotions matter too. Sometimes you need to be firm.
